statements: UPDATE operational_metrics SET revenue = 2000, expenses = 1500, profit = revenue - expenses WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE operational_metrics SET profit = expenses - revenue, expenses = 1800, revenue = 2500 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE operational_metrics SET revenue = 10000, expenses = 5000, profit = revenue - expenses WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE operational_metrics SET date = '2022-10-25', expenses = 3000, revenue = revenue + 2000 WHERE id = 2;
